params.defense: Invincivulnerable *(You have both Invincible and Vulnerable defense. You take attacks as if you were Invincible, but you die from visits as if you were Vulnerable.)*

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shut another player in each night, causing their ability to fail unless it would be Astral.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ability is Astral.
- On full moons, your ability rampages.
